input.sentences: today i introduced my uncle to a live audience .
he sang to the crowd with such passion .
all the senior citizens were grinding on the dance floor .
output.sentences: Edgar, who loved live music, introduced his uncle who was locally known musician.
Uncle Albert sang with passion and soon the crowd gathered around the stage.
He kept his first few songs upbeat, and sang better than he ever had in the past.
Tonight his parents were celebrating 50 years of marriage and he made sure their song was moving as they danced in the spotlight.
Soon the senior dancers were grinding across the floor when he switched it up to some 1960's rock and roll.
